input.title: Hammer X Hammer Turbo Air - Distance Golf Driver for Men and Women - 10 Degree Right Handed Golf Club Driver (Green)
input.bullet_points:
Legendary Performance: Experience the innovation of Jack Hamm, 6x World Long Drive Champion, with the Hammer Turbo Air Driver. This driver delivers the technology and power used by champions, for golfers of all skill levels!
Unleash Your Inner Powerhouse: Struggling with a slice? Our driver's innovative 6 No Drag Turbo Speed Slots eliminate backspin, straighten your shots for pinpoint accuracy, and add up to 60 yards to your drives. It's time to say goodbye to lost balls and hello to a more confident, powerful swing!
Effortless Accuracy: Our innovative Power Core with Anti-Slice Tech and Anti-Drag design streamlines airflow and automatically corrects your swing plane. Hit straighter, longer drives with confidence, and ditch the frustration of slices and hooks!
One Shaft Fits All, Plays Like a Dream: Our Auto-Flex Smart Shaft automatically adjusts to your swing speed for consistent power. No need for multiple shafts - it adapts to you! Plus, the Anti-Slice Technology eliminates slices for straighter, longer drives. Experience confidence and control in every swing!
Unlock Explosive Distance: The Hammer Turbo Air's massive sweet spot and anti-drag technology maximize forgiveness and launch for longer, straighter drives. Confidence on every tee shot, no matter your swing!
Headcover not included
input.description: Are you tired of struggling to find fairways and losing balls to frustrating slices? The Hammer Turbo Air Driver is engineered to be your secret weapon on the course. Designed with the expertise of 6-time World Long Drive Champion Jack Hamm, this innovative driver unlocks explosive distance, eliminates slices, and boosts your confidence on every tee shot. Hammer X's revolutionary Anti-Slice Technology featuring 6 Turbo Speed Slots takes the guesswork out of your swing. These slots streamline airflow and automatically correct your swing plane, resulting in pinpoint accuracy. Say goodbye to slices and hooks – the Hammer Turbo Air Driver delivers straighter, longer drives that leave you feeling confident and in control. No need to worry about finding the perfect shaft flex. The Auto-Flex Smart Shaft is the ultimate in adaptability. This intelligent shaft adjusts to your swing speed, providing consistent power for beginners and enhanced control for seasoned players. Everyone can experience the benefit of a perfectly matched swing. The Hammer Turbo Air boasts an industry-leading oversized sweet spot, maximizing forgiveness on off-center hits. This translates to longer, straighter drives that boost your confidence and let you rip it with power on every swing. Combined with the driver's innovative Anti-Drag Technology, you'll experience the explosive distance you've always dreamed of. The Hammer Turbo Air minimizes drag, allowing you to launch the ball higher and farther with every swing. The Hammer Turbo Air Driver isn't just for long drive champions; it's designed to elevate the game of golfers of all skill levels. Jack Hamm's legacy of innovation is built into every aspect of this driver. Experience the difference and take your game to the next level. Order your Hammer Turbo Air Driver today and see the results for yourself!

input.title: Hammer Golf Putter for Right and Left Handed for Men and Women, Align straighter, Achieve a Natural Stroke, and Sink More Putts
input.bullet_points:
Stop Missing: The Hammer Putter's revolutionary design by Jack Hamm helps you putt with confidence. Align straighter, achieve a natural stroke, and sink more putts, all at an affordable price. Experience the Hammer difference!
Tired of 3-Putts: Ditch the traditional putter! The Hammer Putter's innovative X-axis design promotes a natural stroke and effortless alignment for consistent putting. Save strokes, boost confidence, and enjoy the game again.
Affordable Upgrade: The Hammer Putter delivers premium performance at a fraction of the cost. Stop spending hundreds on putters that don't work. Experience the difference with the Hammer Putter and start sinking more putts.
Lower Your Handicap: The Hammer Putter is your secret weapon. Lag long putts closer and drain more short putts with improved confidence and putting accuracy. Unleash your putting potential and see the strokes fall away.
Legendary Performance: Experience the creative prowess of Jack Hamm, 6x World Long Drive Champion, in the Hammer Golf Putter. This putter delivers the innovation and power used by champions, for golfers of all skill levels!
input.description: Are you tired of watching putts lip out or roll agonizingly past the hole? Do you dream of confidently stepping up and draining those critical putts that shave strokes off your game? The Hammer Putter, a revolutionary design by putting legend Jack Hamm, can be your secret weapon on the green. For decades, golfers have battled the limitations of traditional putters. They often force an unnatural stroke and make alignment a constant struggle. The Hammer Putter breaks the mold with its innovative X-axis design. This unique approach promotes a natural putting stroke and effortless alignment, allowing you to focus on sinking putts, not mechanics. Say goodbye to three-putts and hello to a putting experience that inspires confidence. The Hammer Putter's intuitive design helps you achieve consistent ball roll and improved distance control, letting you putt with precision and assurance. Whether you're a seasoned golfer or just starting out, the Hammer Putter can elevate your putting game. Jack Hamm, a six-time World Long Drive Champion, understands the importance of putting accuracy. He's poured his experience and expertise into this innovative putter, creating a tool that empowers golfers of all skill levels to unlock their putting potential. The Hammer Putter delivers premium performance without the premium price tag. Stop spending hundreds on putters that leave you frustrated. Experience the difference with the Hammer Putter and start holing more putts and lowering your scores. The Hammer Putter is more than just a club; it's a putting revolution. Experience the confidence and precision that Jack Hamm's innovative design delivers. Order your Hammer Putter today and take your putting game to the next level!

Enhancing performance for golfers of all skill levels

input.description: HARPLD IMPORT WOBBLE WEDGES Fix anything that wobbles; level anything that tilts with Wobble Wedges. Shims provide consistent expansive / stabilizing force when compressed between two surfaces. They're perfect for leveling plumbing fixtures, fountains and statuary, furniture and appliances - cabinets, shelving, workbenches, bookshelves, patio furniture, and herb and flower pots. Use them indoors or outdoors; use them to level nearly anything, anywhere. Highlights: * Interlocking and stackable. * Tighten rattling * Use them indoors or outdoors * Clear plastic. * 1 7/8\" x 1 1/8\".

expected.reasoning: The primary function of the Wobble Wedge is to level and stabilize various objects that are uneven or wobbling, making it the main reason consumers would purchase this product.

input.title: Hammer X Dr. Knockdown 80 Degree Golf Wedge - The Ultimate Short Game Wedge, Flop Shots Made Easy
input.bullet_points:
Stop and Drop Technology: with 80 Degrees of loft, the Dr. Knockdown Wedge offers the most loft in a golf wedge on the entire market making it easier for golfers to get the ball in the air more quickly around the greens and into the "gimme zone".
Smart Shaft Technology: Equipped with advanced Smart Shaft Technology, the Dr. Knockdown Wedge ensures optimal flexibility and responsiveness for smooth & accurate shots, no matter your playing ability.
Versatile Performance: Hit perfect pitches from grass, sand, thick rough, divots, soggy ground, uphill, and downhill lies, handling any shot effortlessly without opening your clubface or changing your swing.
input.description: Introducing Dr. Knockdown, the first-ever 80-degree golf wedge — the club missing from everyone's bag. The Dr. Knockdown Wedge is designed for amateur golfers looking to improve their touch around the green. Versatile enough to handle pitches from any lie including: grass, sand, thick rough, divots, uphill, and downhill lies. The Dr. Knockdown will let you manage any shot around the green without manipulating the clubface or changing your swing. Eliminate chunks, blades, and bad chips, consistently landing you in the “gimme zone”. Fully assembled and ready for play, the Dr. Knockdown Wedge is the missing piece in every golfer’s bag.

input.title: Spacewalk M7 Electric Bike,20" Fat Tire Ebike,Ideal for Riders Under 5'5" & Above,4 Shock Absorbers More Comfort,24.9mph,1500W (Peak) Motor,48V 15AH Battery,50 Miles Electric,75 Miles PAS - Orange
input.bullet_points:
Multi-Shock System:Equipped with a total of 4 shock absorbers (2x front and 2x rear),along with a large shock-absorbing saddle design and 20" X 4" fat tires for enhanced cushioning,providing a more comfortable ride.All-terrain tires are suitable for mountain,sand,snow,grass,and various other surfaces.
Motor & Battery:Features a 1500W peak motor with 3-speed settings and a maximum speed of 24.9MPH.Equipped with a 48V 15AH removable battery,it offers a range of 50 miles in pure electric mode and 75 miles in electric assist mode.The battery can be easily removed using a key for convenient charging.
3 Riding Modes:(1)Pure Electric Mode—ride without pedaling,with 3 adjustable speed settings.(2)Electric Assist Mode—pedaling is easier,allowing for longer distances.(3)Pedal-Only Mode—features Shimano 6-speed transmission for precise power transfer,ensuring a more comfortable ride.Turn off the motor and get your workout started.
LCD Display & Lighting:Equipped with an LCD screen that shows various parameters in real-time,including battery level,speed,and distance traveled.Press the "M" button on the left handlebar to toggle and view additional parameters.It also features front and rear lights,as well as rear turn signals,ensuring safe riding at night.
Easy Assembly & Cargo Rack:90% pre-assembled,allowing customers to complete the assembly of the e-bike in just a few simple steps.Additionally,we provide a rear cargo rack for carrying small items,enhancing your riding experience.
VIP After-Sales Team:Our team of professional engineers is here to provide expert service and guarantee 100% problem resolution.If you encounter any issues,please do not return the product directly.You can contact us through Amazon,the email listed in the manual,our official website,or by calling us directly for assistance.

input.title: C INVERTER Bike Bag, ebike Accessories, Waterproof and Dirt Resistant, not Easy to Deform, Essential for Large-Capacity Travel, Suitable for Mobile Phones Within 6.9 inches
input.bullet_points:
Highly sensitive touch screen: Put the mobile phone in the bag, you can still operate the mobile phone while riding, view maps, adjust navigation, answer calls, etc. Without taking out the mobile phone. The zipper locks tightly to ensure the safety of the phone. Convenient equipment for travel.
Waterproof and dirt resistant: The storage bag is made of waterproof material and the zipper is tightly closed to ensure that the items in the bag are dry when used on rainy days. Black appearance, dirt resistant, and stains are easily erased.
Large-capacity storage space: Large space for storing personal belongings, such as mobile phones, headphones, data cables, keys, mobile power supplies, gloves, wallets, etc. The sides of the two mesh compartments are designed for classification storage. Perfectly compatible with Android/iPhone phones under 6.9 inches, such as iPhone11 X XS Max XR 8 7 6s 6 plus 5s/Samsung Galaxy s8 s7 note 7
EVA 3D process manufacturing: Made of EVA material 3D die casting. The shape is strong and not easy to deform, and the service life is long.
Easy to install: Ultra-simple design, it can be installed in one minute, and the storage bag can be stably fixed to the frame even on bumpy mountain roads.

input.title: Folding Electric Bike for Adults - 750W Peak Power, Removable 48V 10Ah Battery, 20MPH Top Speed, 18-25 Miles Extended Range, 9 Suspension Systems - Ultimate Urban, Fitness & Recreation, White
input.bullet_points:
【Powerful 400W (750W Peak) Adult Electric Bike】 Experience agile urban commuting with quick starts and easy hill climbs. This electric bike for adults reaches 20 MPH (32 km/h) with 3-level pedal assist for daily commuting or leisure rides, featuring UL2849 certification and robust ebike performance
【Advanced Safety for All-Terrain & Night Riding】 Ride confidently in rain or challenging conditions with this adult electric bike featuring instant-response front/rear disc brakes for controlled stops. High-power front headlight illuminates paths while brake-activated rear light alerts traffic, making this electric bicycle your reliable all-weather companion
【9-Suspension Comfort System & Premium Ride】 Enjoy smooth journeys on this folding electric bike with advanced 9-suspension technology and 14-inch tires that absorb vibrations. Carbon steel frame supports 264 lbs (120 kg), perfect for city errands, park rides, or weekend fitness on this versatile e-bike
【Removable 48V 10Ah Long-Life Battery】 Maximize convenience with the removable battery on this electric bicycle for adults - charge safely indoors in 4-6 hours. Delivering 18-25 mile (30-40 km) range, it powers daily commutes and adventures on this reliable ebike for adults
【Ultra-Portable Tool-Free Folding Ebike】 Achieve maximum portability with this electric bike adults that folds in seconds without tools. Compact design stores easily in closets, car trunks, or under stairs - the perfect folding electric bike for spontaneous trips, camping, or urban mobility solutions

input.title: EILLEO Electric Dirt Bike for Adults/Teens, 48V 3000W Peak Power Electric Motorcycle with 14"/12" Fat Tire, 37.5MPH 60 Miles Range, Mountain Off-Road Ebike with Hydraulic Brakes
input.bullet_points:
[Powerful Brushless Motor for High Performance] The EILLEO electric dirt bike's motor delivers a maximum power output of 3000W, designed to provide great power and torque for effortlessly tackling any off-road challenge. With a 3000W peak power and 180N.m of torque, this adult electric bicycles ensures you have the strength to conquer steep hills and rugged terrain with ease.
[48V 20Ah High-capacity Battery] The EILLEO electric off-road mountain bike features a 48V 20Ah high-capacity lithium-ion battery, reaching a range of 40-60 miles to power your long-distance rides. Charging is fast and convenient, taking only 6-7 hours to fully recharge.(Note: Actual maximum speed and range depend on load, terrain, incline, and other factors.).
[14“/12”Off-Road Tires] This off-road electric mountain bike features 14-inch front and 12-inch rear fat off-road tires, delivering unmatched traction to ensure you conquer any terrain with ease.
[Hydraulic Dual Brakes and Full Suspension System] This adult electric off-road bike features a premium hydraulic dual brake system, responsive front fork suspension, and rear nitrogen shock absorbers, ensuring comfort and stability—especially on rough terrain.
[Bright Headlight & Tail Light]For enhanced safety, the EILLEO electric mountain bike features a headlight to improve visibility and a tail light so other riders can see you on the road.
【Note & After Sales Guarantee】 The electric dirtbike and Bike Cell Phone Bag are shipped separately and arrive at different times. If you encounter any problems, we will strive to provide you with a satisfactory after-sales service.

input.title: Spacewalk Electric Bike M6 / M7 for Teens,16" / 20" Ebike,1500W Peak Motor,21.7mph / 24.9mph,48V 15Ah Removable Battery,4X Suspension,50 Miles Pure Electric,70 Miles PAS (16''Glossy Black)

【Small size electric bike】Featuring a 16" tire frame,ideal for riders under 5'2" and teenagers.Easier to handle and more efficient to ride,providing a better and more enjoyable riding experience.
【Enhanced Shock Absorption】 Equipped with 4 shock absorbers (front and rear),a large shock-absorbing seat,and 16"X4" fat tires for extra cushioning,ensuring a more comfortable ride.All-terrain tires suitable for mountain,sand,snow,and grass surfaces.
【Safety First】- Our electric bikes are certified to the strict standards of UL2849 . Dual disc brakes ensure all-weather stopping power, paired with front & rear lights for enhanced visibility during day and night rides.
【Power & Speed】1500W(Peak) motor provides a top speed of up to 35 km/h/21.7 mph. Meet all your commuting needs such as outdoor gatherings at work. Additionally, it features brighter LED headlights and taillights to keep you visible and safe while riding at night.
【Long-lasting Battery Life】Spacewalk M6 is equipped with a 48V 15Ah capacity removable battery that can travel up to 70 miles with pedal assist and 50 miles using electricity alone. You can choose to charge your e-bike directly or remove the battery and charge it at home. The battery takes only 4-6 hours to fully charge, ensuring you have more time on the road and less time waiting to ride.
【Installation & After-Sales】90% pre-assembled, you can easily add accessories to your bike. If you have any further questions, please contact us. input.description:
Description

Introducing the Stolpen Collection: a fusion of minimalist sophistication and athletic elegance, designed specifically for the modern man who seeks both style and functionality in his timepiece. With its sleek 42mm case and sporty design elements, each watch in this collection embodies a perfect balance of form and function, making it the ideal accessory for every occasion. Crafted from exquisite olive wood, sandalwood, and rosewood, the Stolpen Collection pays homage to nature's beauty, with each wood grain pattern telling its own unique story. The rich, earthy tones of olive wood exude warmth and character, while the aromatic scent and smooth texture of sandalwood evoke a sense of tranquility and refinement. Meanwhile, the deep, luxurious hues of rosewood add a touch of timeless elegance to every wrist. Featuring a wooden watch strap, the Stolpen Collection offers a seamless integration of style and comfort, ensuring that your timepiece not only looks good but feels good too. The natural materials used in the construction of the strap provide a lightweight and breathable fit, perfect for the active lifestyle of the modern man. With its minimalist dial and clean lines, the Stolpen Collection exudes understated sophistication, making it a versatile accessory that effortlessly transitions from the boardroom to the gym. Whether paired with a tailored suit or casual athleisure attire, this watch is sure to make a statement wherever you go. Elevate your wrist game with the Stolpen Collection—a testament to craftsmanship, style, and adventure.

input.description:
Description

If you’re like us, then you also love the look of wood grain watches but don’t like the feel of fake wood or cheap bamboo. The Zeitholz Wood Grain Watches for Men & Women are 100% made of natural wood! Click ADD TO CART now to experience that natural wood feeling today. Wooden watches are great gifts for any occasion. What wrist size does it fit with? Any size! We include tools & instructions on how to easily adjust it to fit any wrist. This is especially important if you’re buying it as a gift when you aren’t sure about the receiver’s wrist size. How do we adjust the size & time? Easily adjust the wooden watch size by using the included link adjustment tool, then adding or removing links until it’s perfect. You can easily slip the watch on & off by unbuckling the security strap. Adjusting time is simple: Find the round knob on the side of the watch, pull it out, turn it to the desired time, then push it back in. Get this, you're covered by our 100% money-back watch guard guarantee, no questions asked. Click Add to Cart now to experience that natural wood feeling today.

input.title: Lexon Flip+ Travel Digital Alarm Clock, Reversible On/Off Faces Small Travel Clock with LCD Display & Touch Sensor Light, Battery Operated, Rubber - Dark Grey
input.bullet_points:
Travel on Time with Style - Compact, portable & travel-friendly, you can easily pack it in your luggage or backpack. Despite its small size (measured at 3.3 x 2 x 0.9”), it packs a powerful alarm so you're up and ready for your next adventure.
A Reversible ON-OFF Alarm Clock - The alarm is activated by the simple gesture of flipping the clock over to either ON or OFF. Want your alarm clock ON? Flip your clock so the ON side is visible. Then be sure the OFF side is facing up to turn it off.
You'll Never Have to Squint Again - The electroluminescent display & touch sensor makes it easy to check time, even in the middle of the night. The snooze function will help you wake up to your own terms - and help extend your sleep!
Power it Up with Ease - Wireless, this mini digital desk clock runs on 2 AAA batteries (included in your purchase). The non-slip rubber fabric prevents the clock from sliding off the table. And it's durable so you can count on it to last for years.
No More Boring Clocks - Elevate your nightstand or desk with a splash of color & sleek design. It comes in 15 fun colors that will fit perfectly in a child's room, teenager's room or on a shelf. Easy to read, easy to set & easy to love!

It features distressed blades with the hours stamped in roman numerals. Use as decoration in living room, bedroom or anywhere in your home The wall clock has a metal hook built in to the back of the frame for easy and secure wall display. It can be easily wall mounted with minimal assembly.

input.title: Equity 25016 8" Basics Quartz Analog Wall Clock
input.bullet_points:
8" analog wall clock with vibrant green recycled plastic frame combines functionality with style. Its ideal size suits various wall spaces while adding a refreshing touch to any room.
Battery-powered clock with quartz movement delivers reliable timekeeping. Easy-to-set mechanism allows quick adjustments, blending modern accuracy with analog charm.
Glass lens protects clock face while ensuring clear visibility. Bold numerals on white background with contrasting metal hands, including red second hand, enable easy time-checking.
Runs on one AA battery (not included). Lightweight design allows flexible placement without cords - hang it wherever suits your space and needs.
Frame crafted from recycled plastic combines eco-friendliness with modern style. This sustainable choice reduces environmental impact while ensuring lasting durability.
input.description: Introduce a pop of color and reliable timekeeping to your space with the Equity 8" Analog Wall Clock Basics Quartz 25016. This contemporary wall-mounted timepiece combines vibrant style with practical functionality, ideal for any modern home or office setting. The striking green recycled plastic frame adds a refreshing visual element while reflecting an eco-conscious choice. At its core, precise quartz movement ensures accurate timekeeping. Battery-powered and cord-free, it offers flexible placement options. Designed for optimal readability, the clock face features bold numerals on a white background, protected by a durable glass lens. Metal hands, including a red second hand, provide excellent contrast and smooth movement for easy time-checking from across the room. Measuring 8 inches in diameter, this La Crosse wall clock balances presence and subtlety. Its lightweight construction allows for easy installation without special tools. More than just a timepiece, it's a versatile piece of decor that enhances any room's ambiance. The contemporary green design complements various interior styles, from minimalist modern to eclectic chic. Durable and low-maintenance, this clock offers the perfect blend of form and function, making it an essential addition to any space or an ideal gift.
